SEARCH
Package grafiosch.common

Class UserAccessHelper

java.lang.Object
grafiosch.common.UserAccessHelper
public class UserAccessHelper extends Object
Helper class for checking user access rights and roles in relation to entities. This class provides static methods to determine if a user has administrative privileges, ownership of an entity, or other specific roles relevant to editing or viewing data.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserAccessHelper

      public UserAccessHelper()

  • Method Details

    • isAdminOrOwnerOfEntity

      public static boolean isAdminOrOwnerOfEntity(User user, Auditable entity)
      Checks if the given user has the 'ROLE_ADMIN' or is the owner of the specified auditable entity. Ownership is determined by comparing the entity's creator ID with the user's ID.
      Parameters:
      user - The User whose permissions are being checked.
      entity - The Auditable entity to check against.
      Returns:
      true if the user is an administrator or the owner of the entity, false otherwise.

    • hasRightsOrPrivilegesForEditingOrDelete

      public static boolean hasRightsOrPrivilegesForEditingOrDelete(User user, Auditable entity)
      Checks if the user has higher privileges (ROLE_ADMIN or ROLE_ALL_EDIT) or is the owner of the entity, granting them rights for editing or deleting the entity.
      Parameters:
      user - The User whose permissions are being checked.
      entity - The Auditable entity to check against.
      Returns:
      true if the user has ROLE_ADMIN, ROLE_ALL_EDIT, or owns the entity (including checking AdditionalRights), false otherwise.

    • hasRightsForEditingOrDeleteOnEntity

      public static boolean hasRightsForEditingOrDeleteOnEntity(User user, Auditable entity)
      Checks if the user is the direct owner of the auditable entity or has additional rights if the entity implements the AdditionalRights interface. Ownership is determined by matching the entity's creator ID with the user's ID.
      Parameters:
      user - The User to check.
      entity - The Auditable entity (which might also be an instance of AdditionalRights).
      Returns:
      true if the user is the owner or has been granted additional rights on the entity, false otherwise.

    • isAdmin

      public static boolean isAdmin(User user)
      Checks if the given user has the 'ROLE_ADMIN' role.
      Parameters:
      user - The User to check.
      Returns:
      true if the user has the 'ROLE_ADMIN' role, false otherwise.

    • hasHigherPrivileges

      public static boolean hasHigherPrivileges(User user)
      Checks if the given user has higher privileges, specifically 'ROLE_ADMIN' or 'ROLE_ALL_EDIT'. These roles typically grant broader access to edit or manage data across different entities.
      Parameters:
      user - The User to check.
      Returns:
      true if the user has 'ROLE_ADMIN' or 'ROLE_ALL_EDIT', false otherwise.

    • isLimitedEditingUser

      public static boolean isLimitedEditingUser(User user)
      Checks if the given user has the 'ROLE_LIMIT_EDIT' role. This role typically implies that the user can edit certain entities or fields but with some restrictions compared to users with higher privileges.
      Parameters:
      user - The User to check.
      Returns:
      true if the user has the 'ROLE_LIMIT_EDIT' role, false otherwise.
